page.title: 17Sunday in Whiston
page.content: Sundays are eventful for me because I get up very late and take an hour to have my breakfast. At 11.00 am I walk down to Sunday School at the chapel. I stay there until 12 noon. When I come out of chapel I walk home and my dad meets me at the end of the drive in the car because we go into Cheadle for me to go swimming at the club and dad to play basket-ball with his friends. After swimming I go and watch dad play basket-ball and sometimes if I have got my trainers on I play basket-ball too, just at the end. We get home at about 2.00 pm just in time to see Eastenders on television. I watch television for the rest of the afternoon and then at 6.30 pm we have my favourite meal, a roast dinner. Later on I go to bed.
